Module com.group25
Package com.group25

Class AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.group25.AudioPlayer
public class AudioPlayer extends Object
Manages audio playback, including sound effects and background music Supports looping and the ability to load audio from specified file paths
Version:
1.2
Author:
Adam Murdock Gale, Sameer Mehboob Bugti, Saad Meshaal Koker, Jesse Titus, Fahmid Abdullah
